properties.Scheme: Springs near the house of Mr. Samarakoon
properties.Problem to:
Dilapidated tank. Recommendations. 
1. to construct a ferro cement storage tank of 35 m3 capacity.
2. Demarcate an area of 10 perch as a reservation around. 
3. Make dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Agave/ Vetiver/ Canas/ Areca nut trees /Ku
